title: AI Medical Image Analyzer
description: A web application using deep learning to detect anomalies in X-ray images. This project demonstrates the application of convolutional neural networks to medical diagnostics, potentially speeding up the diagnosis process.

title: Natural Language Processing for EHRs
description: A system that uses NLP techniques to extract meaningful information from electronic health records. The project aims to improve information retrieval from unstructured medical texts.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio built with Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS, featuring automated research updates through Python scripts and GitHub Actions.

title: Healthcare Data Analytics Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing healthcare data. Provides insights into patient outcomes, treatment efficacy, and resource allocation.
